text:
I have a idea that now when you rent a apartment there will be a paper you will need to sign saying that you chose the broker on your own accord even though this broker has an exclusive with the landlord. If you make a fuss about signing it they will not rent you the Apartment. This will allow the broker to keep collecting the fee from the tenant 

Anyone else feel this way?
title: Anyone else thing landlord will start skirting the new broker rule
